name: Blaine Bryant
quote: Effective IT leadership is built on strong governance, clear strategy, and delivering measurable value to the business.
fullStory:
Blaine Bryant is an accomplished IT executive with more than 25 years of experience leading enterprise technology operations and service-management transformations. His career spans global infrastructure operations, banking and financial services IT, and large-scale enterprise governance programs.

Blaine spent over a decade at BMC Software, where he led IT service governance, software-asset management, financial oversight for IT operations, and major digital-transformation initiatives. He became known for driving measurable savings, improving service maturity, and aligning IT operations with business strategy.

In his most recent role, Blaine joined Accelya Group as Global CIO, where he oversees enterprise technology strategy, IT operations, cybersecurity, and digital transformation efforts across the organization. His leadership emphasizes governance, cost optimization, risk management, and building high-performing IT teams.

timeline.title: Early Career - IT Operations Leadership
timeline.description: Led global infrastructure operations, banking IT operations, and mortgage-platform technology services.

timeline.title: Senior Director, IS&T Services Governance – BMC Software
timeline.description: Oversaw IT service management, governance, software-asset management, and IT financial strategy. Delivered multi-million-dollar cost-optimization outcomes.

timeline.description: Professional executive training focused on IT leadership and enterprise strategy.

timeline.description: Presented BMC's enterprise software-asset-management transformation at major ITAM conferences.

timeline.description: Leads enterprise-wide IT strategy, security, governance, and digital transformation initiatives.

experience.title: SVP - Global CIO
experience.description: Responsible for providing strategic leadership and vision for the company's Information Technology (IT) initiatives. Oversees the development, implementation, and maintenance of the company's global IT infrastructure, systems, security, and policies, ensuring that technology investments align with the company's objectives and drive business growth.

experience.title: Global Chief Information Officer & Head of Security
experience.description: Recruited by Vista Consulting Group as a multi-tour Vista Equity portfolio company executive to be Accelya's first CIO. Transformed and consolidated IT and Security operations of multiple acquired companies into a global enterprise IT organization supporting product and technology operations for airlines across a broad service portfolio of travel offer, order, revenue accounting, and settlement services for passenger and cargo traffic.

experience.title: Senior Director - Enterprise Portfolio Management & IT Service Management
experience.description: Recruited to guide IT teams through digital transformation and cost reduction initiatives. Lead 24-member team and manage $120M budget. Chair IT Advisory Committee comprising 16 VPs across all major business units to prioritize IT capital investments and evaluate enterprise projects portfolio. Oversee multiple IT transformation and business integration initiatives to bolster service levels, financial transparency, project prioritization, and value creation. Responsible for all aspects of IT enterprise portfolio management, IT service management, and IT financial performance for BMC Software.

experience.title: Vice President of Technology Operations & Security
experience.description: Hand-selected to steer stabilization and enhancement of SaaS platform servicing 85% of all mortgage lenders. Assembled and led 60+-member IT operations group. Managed $5M budget. Oversaw IT Operations, Customer Success, PMO and Information Security.

experience.title: Senior Vice President - Technology Operations & Security
experience.description: Stepped into newly created role charged with expanding and leading technology operations as bank grew from 18 to 50+ locations in 3 years. Managed 38-member team and a $25M budget. Oversaw end-user services, help desk, data center operations, information security, application support, project management office, and network and telecommunication.

name: Jeff Richardson
quote: A successful transformation blends the right technology with clear vision, strong leadership, and empowered teams.
fullStory:
Jeff Richardson is a seasoned technology leader with deep experience driving organizational development through strategic IT advancement. Over decades, he has led complex digital-transformation efforts across corporate, nonprofit, and consulting environments.

Jeff began his career in IT leadership positions within regional enterprises — including a key role directing technology for a multi-brand grocery enterprise undergoing ownership transition. He later served as VP / CIO at a service-organization firm, where he oversaw enterprise technology and modernization strategy. Afterwards, he expanded into the nonprofit sector as Senior Product Manager at a global nonprofit, managing enterprise applications and global systems.

In 2017, Jeff founded B5 Digital Strategy, working as Principal Consultant to help organizations navigate technology growth, digital strategy, and operational transformation. After several years of consulting success, in 2024 he became Chief Technology Officer at Daniel Stark LLP, where he now oversees firm-wide technology strategy, digital operations, and innovation.

Jeff is known for guiding cross-functional teams through complex challenges and delivering forward-looking technology solutions that drive measurable impact.

name: Mahidhar Panyam, FAPM
quote: Delivering transformation is about aligning people, processes, and technology to create lasting value for global organizations.
fullStory:
Mahidhar Panyam is a seasoned program and transformation leader with extensive experience in driving process improvement, system integration, and business transformation initiatives across global enterprises. He is passionate about data exploration and collaborative problem solving, leveraging these skills to streamline operations, reduce costs, and improve customer experiences.

Mahidhar began his career at Relativity Technologies in India, developing software proof-of-concepts and training customers on technical tools. He then advanced through leadership roles at Accenture, managing large-scale projects in healthcare and telecom, including global offshore delivery and talent management.

In 2013, Mahidhar joined Dell Technologies, starting as a Senior Advisor (Intern) in Commercial Sales Operations. Over the years, he progressed to Senior Advisor for Global Sales Operations, implementing cost-saving initiatives, improving cash-flow processes, and enhancing customer experience. Since 2016, he has served as a Consultant in the Business Transformation Office, delivering operational capabilities, managing cross-functional projects, guiding solution development, and ensuring successful adoption of new processes and systems.

name: Divyesh Batra
quote: Data-driven security requires precision, collaboration, and a proactive approach across all layers of technology.
fullStory:
Divyesh Batra is an experienced data engineer specializing in global information security and data analytics within the financial services sector. He currently serves as a Staff Data Engineer at Visa, where he designs and manages complex data pipelines to track vulnerabilities, technical security requirements, and container security across Visa and acquired entities.

Divyesh's career began in engineering and web development roles at Texas A&M Engineering Experiment Station (TEES) and GATE Energy, where he built web applications, automated workflows, and implemented OCR-based data processing solutions. He later worked as a Data Engineer at Wood Mackenzie, automating cost estimation workflows and building dashboards for business intelligence.

Since joining Visa in 2020, Divyesh has progressed from Cyber Security Analyst to Senior Data Engineer, and currently Staff Data Engineer. He has led projects involving Apache Spark, Python, SQL, Cassandra, Airflow, and Linux to build scoring logic, data quality checks, workflow orchestration, and vulnerability management solutions. Divyesh has also earned certifications including Databricks Associate Certified Developer for Apache Spark and completed multiple leadership programs with McKinsey Academy.
skills: Data Engineering & Pipeline Development (Apache Spark, PySpark, SQL, Cassandra, Airflow)

name: Suryakant K.
role: Senior Business Operations Manager – Enterprise Support Experience
quote: Technology, data, and customer insights together create safer, more efficient operations.
fullStory:
Suryakant K. is an operations and customer experience leader with deep expertise in fleet safety, AI-driven solutions, and scalable business operations. He currently leads enterprise support initiatives at Samsara, leveraging data analytics, AI, and automation to optimize processes and enhance fleet safety outcomes.

Throughout his career, Suryakant has focused on improving customer experiences, operational efficiency, and safety compliance by aligning cross-functional teams to design scalable programs. Prior to Samsara, he held strategic roles at VMware, where he led partner program management and business operations analytics projects that significantly improved partner performance, deal win rates, and operational efficiency.

Suryakant is also committed to mentorship and volunteering. He has worked with Teach For India to enhance educational opportunities for underprivileged children and actively supports professional mentorship programs, helping data analysts tell compelling stories through data.

timeline.description: Redesigned Partner Integrity Program, improving partner health from 40% to 91% and reducing onboarding time by 50%. Developed Non-Standard Pricing Partner Model, increasing deal win rate from 20% to 70% and closing $50M in deals in a quarter.

timeline.description: Led initiatives to enhance fleet safety and customer experience using AI, ML, and analytics. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement scalable safety programs and operational improvements.

name: John Billings
quote: Bridging strategy and execution to create measurable growth and lasting impact.
fullStory:
John Billings is a global executive and revenue strategist with extensive experience in sales leadership, strategic execution, M&A integration, and AI-driven business transformation. He has a proven record of building high-performing teams, creating scalable revenue engines, and driving measurable business outcomes across technology, travel, and software industries.

John's expertise spans end-to-end sales operations, digital transformation, and strategic consulting. He has a strong focus on bridging the strategy-execution gap, turning organizational vision into actionable results while cultivating a culture of accountability and winning mindset.

He is also an advisor and mentor, supporting the next generation of entrepreneurs and students through AggieX and Texas A&M's mentoring programs. John serves as an Adjunct Professor at Texas A&M University – Mays Business School and has taught Professional Selling at Schreiner University.

timeline.title: Director of Business Development – PROS, Inc.
timeline.description: Led North America and Europe sales efforts, generating $55M in new L&I revenue and $23M in recurring revenue. Established team processes, optimized sales cycle, and contributed to product development initiatives.
